name: ux-axioms-mcp
description: UX Axioms Model Context Protocol Server

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "release: %s" && git push origin HEAD --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "release: %s" && git push origin HEAD --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "release: %s" && git push origin HEAD --follow-tags
scripts.release:rc: npm version prerelease --preid rc -m "release: %s" && git push origin HEAD --follow-tags
